Message:
Mother...should be strong...
So, why is she...?

I could hear someone’s
fast-approaching footsteps...
It’s...that messenger girl...?

“What are you spacing out for?!
Do your whole deity thing
and save her, quick...!”

The girl yanked my hand,
but my body was frozen
on the spot.

“You’re different from me!
You have the power
to save your mother,
so what are you waiting for?!”

“The weak...are destined to die...
That’s why, I can’t...”

Her hand slapped my cheek.
Why...do you look
like you could cry...?

“Then...would your mother
abandon you if you were weak?”

My words caught in my throat.
The sight of my mother
flashed through my mind.
Mother has always...!

“You don’t just abandon
who’s most important to you
just because they’re weak!

“Who cares about
looking noble or strong,
just break that
stupid law already!

Write your own rules,
like the humans you
look down on so much!”
